price: 8. (Y dicen los yinn:) “E intentamos alcanzar el cielo, mas lo encontramos lleno de severos (ángeles) guardianes y de estrellas fugaces[1089].
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا
footnotes: [1089]  Ver las aleyas 8-10 de la sura 37.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lamasnā al-samāa fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhuban
